text: Tell me everything that you see happening in that picture. Everything you see going on. All right. Boy is getting into the cookie jar. He's got one in his hand, but stool is falling over as he's reaching for the cookies. The girl is laughing at him. Mother is standing by the kitchen sink drying dishes. The water is on and it is the sink is spilling over. There is a window over the sink which shows a yard, curtains. There are looks like two cups and a plate on the sink. There's a set of kitchen cabinets. Mother has on an apron and to see the stress. Girl has on a dresser skirt and blouse. Boy looks like he's got on short trousers and a shirt with a sweater. Cookie jars full of cookies. The lid is off. That's it.
